about_the_game:
A project from a one man dev team, MALEDICTOR is a boomer shooter inspired by classics such as Blood, DOOM, and Duke Nukem.

Take the role of the resurrected Clayton in his fight against the Cult of the Maledictor. MALEDICTOR puts an importance on difficult gameplay, high impact weapons, tight movement, and a dark bloody ambience. Avoiding hitscanners, dodging projectiles, evading traps, managing your resources, and committing to an attack are crucial in making it through this boomer shooter where the enemies are as dangerous as you are.

MALEDICTOR features easter eggs and references both retro and modern, interactables scattered throughout the levels, various hidden radio shows spanning from in-game lore to ghost stories, and even playable arcade games with prizes!

Avoiding hitscanners, dodging projectiles, evading traps, managing your resources, and committing to an attack are crucial in making it through this boomer shooter where the enemies are as dangerous as you are.

MALEDICTOR features easter eggs and references both retro and modern, interactables scattered throughout the levels, various hidden radio shows spanning from in-game lore to ghost stories, and even playable arcade games with prizes!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: MALEDICTOR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Classic, dark ambience in a bloody and difficult retro FPS. Fight cultists and demons who are as dangerous as you in your fight against the Maledictor.
